data.text: @egkeller Hmm gloating about creating litter and unnecessary waste. Interesting take in the midst of environmental catastrophe.
@alexwhittemore My lack of colds in the past two years really motivates me to keep wearing them, ngl.

@egkeller I am firmly of the opinion that well-fitting well-filtering masks will be useful indefinitely, and ill happily keep wearing them in all the (many) situations where it's no marginal effort to do so.
@leadinglatte I've gotten more exposure notifications in the past two weeks than I did the rest of the pandemic and they think I'm not gonna keep wearing a mask? hahaha bet
